author: a.j. catalano
comment: doesn't install and load to Gear. Several tries and always stuck at 40% - Bought twice (ok, I;m new to the Gear but shouldn't Google Play KNOW when you've already purchased an app and not charge you again?)

reply.author: OMNIC&S
reply.content: Hi. The theme available via Watch Styler. How to Download guides to watch styler. - Watch Styler can not download via Google play. Only download Watch Styler via Gear Manager>Samsung Gear Apps (Download Guide video : http://youtu.be/d79m_Myi3uU ) If you need additional guidance, please contact us by email. yangji@omnicns.com

author: Tony Harris
comment: Paid £0.63 for this watch for my gear 2 watch.  Downloaded it from play store, only to find i need the app in gear manager, which is not there.  Refunded and seller added to my auto "do not buy from" list
title: What a waste of money
